entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
